duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and coordinate technical discussions, providing guidance and direction to engineering teams.
Deliver scalable and secure cloud-native architecture for enterprise-scale applications.
Work with stakeholders to integrate customer enterprise systems and ensure seamless operations.
Serve as a Subject Matter Expert for technical architecture, tools, and runtime efficiency.
Coach and mentor engineering teams on best practices and drive product architecture vision.
Demonstrate expert level skill in problem decomposition and ability to navigate through ambiguity.
Stay up to date on the latest industry trends and be a Subject Matter Expert in the field.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Information Technology, MIS, Engineering, or a closely related field of study (Master's preferred)
